storyInfo: To earn the merchants' logistical support, Allerdale has no choice but to agree to sell her family's steam armor. Feist and the Doctor arrive at the munitions factory together. Amiya leads her squad to delay the forces of the Sarkaz Royal Court to cover the ongoing operations.

attributes.content: 2:55 P.M. \ Overcast
Londinium
Lady Golding, at last, you're back!
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Did I make it in time?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Of course. You've rehearsed this play for well over a year, and this is the first time the children are performing the whole thing. We couldn't possibly start the show without you.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: I must find myself a good seat, then.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Children, are you ready?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Ready!
attributes.name: Mischievous Boys & Innocent Girls

attributes.content: Let's begin, then.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Lightsâ€”
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Good morning, sir! There is a look of concern on your face. Is something worrying you?
attributes.name: Farmer

attributes.content: The horn of victory has blown atop the walls for three days and nights, but why do I feel uneasy?
attributes.name: Noble

attributes.content: Has our great general not returned triumphant? Praise his bravery and fearlessness!
attributes.name: Farmer

attributes.content: Bravery? Fearlessness? Perhaps. But you did not see the light in his eyes when he returned? When he gazed upon the crown, he was like a condorwing circling above a limping meatbeast.
attributes.name: Noble

attributes.content: Greed can send the most kindhearted man straight to hell.
attributes.name: Farmer

attributes.content: And the masses will forever believe he reaped only what he had sown.
attributes.name: Noble

attributes.content: These are our terms, Miss Allerdale.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: You need certain... 'goods' transported into Londinium, and this is nothing like what we usually carry. Both the quantity and the weight... are highly unusual.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: I shan't ask what it is you need transported and why you need them brought into the city, but you must know that the risk we will carry for transporting them is immense.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: And I'm certain you know there are not many men out there who can do this for you.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: The Sarkaz keep a close eye on all ports of entry. Should they learn of this under-the-table deal, not one of us will leave Londinium alive.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Even if your background and the greed of your friends watching your back are enough to keep your lifestyle in Central Londinium as is, I'm afraid they won't help with this affair.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: If you want this deal to go through, you must put something worth the risk on the table.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Thank you for agreeing to meet with me, Mr. Bader. I will consider your proposal.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Time waits for no one. You must make your decision soon.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Their asking price is high.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We've discussed this situation. The Royal Mint is in Sarkaz hands. News of this must've already spread throughout the entire country via the Magna bankers.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Merchant smugglers are worried that the payment they earn will be worthless by this time next month. Naturally, they demand a method of payment that will keep its value in the long term.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You intend to accept his terms?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Mr. Bader was right. 'Time waits for no one.'
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We have at most five more days to prepare. If we are to ambush the Defense Forces' command tower, we need to bring more weapons into the city.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But... what they demand is very dear to you.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But this is the position we are in, Clovisia.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: This is the position I am in.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: How would you figure what it means to me?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I'm afraid...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: No, I can say this for sure. Your speculations are all wrong.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Do you think of me simply as the magnificent Duke of Cumberland?
attributes.name: Allerdale
Allerdale
attributes.content: You likely weren't even born yet, but I...

attributes.name: Allerdale
attributes.content: I saw them hang Victoria's magnificent Lion King in the palace gardens with my own two eyes.
My name is Cumberland, and everyone knows Cumberland was His Majesty's most faithful friend.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Do you think the reason I stand here in front of you completely unharmed is because the bigwigs in Parliament had mercy on me?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Even now, I still regularly attend Lt. Colonel Lettou's cocktail parties. My words still carry some weight there, and they still need me to soothe the masses.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Of course, this is for our cause. It is also my own means.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I understand your sacrifice. Without your protection, the Self-Salvation Corps could not have made it to this day.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I'm not a girl anymore...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: That thing in the attic means nothing.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It is a pile of scrap.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...Ailshie.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Make the arrangements and have it brought down from the attic.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You disagree with my decision?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I dare not speak, Miss.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: I demand it of you.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Lady Allerdale, no matter what you say, it... it's still House Cumberland's steam armor!
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: The blood of your ancestorsâ€”that most esteemed Duke's blood flows within that armor. It is an honor that Victoria bestowed upon House Cumberland, and it is the symbol of your house, 'Ever on High.'
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: It can be destroyed in the flames of war, it can be given to another who is noble and unsullied. It can't... It can't be traded to a greedy merchant.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: You don't think Mr. Bader is worthy?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: An ancient set of armor! Treated as a lowly collectible! And then traded away at a bargain price for justâ€”
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Ailshie, you've been at my side all these years, ever since I was born.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We've kept the long fallen 'House Cumberland' alive.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: My house was built on nothing but a bunch of empty words. 'Glory,' 'loyalty,' 'nobility,' or perhaps, 'benevolence?' But none of them hold any meaning today.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's you and I upon whom this house now stands.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I understand, Miss.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Have we gotten a letter from them today...?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: You know? The music of the past... as if it still rings loud in my head.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: This manor once hosted a king, but where is he now?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: My apologies, Your Highnessâ€”
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...Call me Vina.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Welcome, Vina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I've returned from patrolling with the fighters.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're still willing to go on missions with the fighters of the Self-Salvation Corps. Splendid.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I want to do as much as I can.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's more than enough for the men to simply know you are here.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I've heard from Clovisia...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah, the attic is absolutely cluttered with rubbish. I've got to pull myself together and clean up a bit.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Lots of dust there. I mustn't have Your Highness helping me with such things.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't want you to sell the armor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Is that an edict from Your Highness?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I have no right to issue one. You're the one responsible for the Self-Salvation Corps, not me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You know better than I what's right for the Corps, and I understand that the armor can buy us an opportunity.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But... Please give me some time.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I will find a way.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina... You needn't worry yourself over this.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Is that an order from the Self-Salvation Corps' Auchterigg District leader?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: If nothing ever happened, perhaps...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Never mind, it's all in the past.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Lady Heidi!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: What is it? Do we have any news from Golding?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Yes, she just sent us a message through the transmitter at the bookstore. It's been forwarded to your terminal.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Good... Very good.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: She says she's safe. Everything in Auchterigg is proceeding according to plan.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Please send a reply. The Doctor's squad has successfully slipped past the checkpoint and infiltrated Highbury. Thanks to the mercenaries working with Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Catherine, there's a problem with the conveyor belt at Loading Area No. 9!
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Let's have a look.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: There's a loose nut.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Patto!
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: You're on shift today, and we're running shorter and shorter on time. What are you doing?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: If we don't speed things up, the Sarkaz will smear your brains across this steel here!
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Sorry, Catherine.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Now hand me the spanner.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: Here.
Quick on your feet, all of a sudden...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Long time no see, Granny.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Patto!
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Catherine...
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: See your team leader after work for a write-up.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Londinium Worker

attributes.content: You let unauthorized personnel into the factory's most important landing zone. You're lucky you haven't been sacked.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Granny, this isn't Patto's fault. It wasn't him who let me in.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Good. Patto, bring Tommy and Day with you to get written up. I'd better not see a single one of you trying to wiggle out of this.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You, and the strange character from god-knows-where next to you...
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Sir, why is the palace so quiet?
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Palace? What palace?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: You are facing the outer walls of the palace.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Move aside, big heap of metal. You're blocking the sunlight.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: I'm facing nothing but an empty house.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: I am a Steam Knight. I purge all evil and injustice!
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Young man, it's over.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: No, it is not, nor shall it ever be!
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: So long as we still know what is right and what is wrong, so long as we never hesitate to make the right decision, it shall never be over!
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: I made my way here precisely for that reason. I invite all men to join me!
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Even you have yet to relax your tightly clenched fist, am I right?
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Amiya, our cover's blown!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: How many hostiles?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Recon operators report four mercenary patrol teams headed in our direction.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We have to pass through the district to reach the Defense Forces' command tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And we've only just made it inside...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The Sarkaz forces are way too quick to react. We're being ambushed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How is the backup route looking?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the mercenaries have been lured to the front here...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: No, it won't work!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: There's another squad coming up fast! The Self-Salvation Corps just spotted them!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What did they say?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They had a run-in with this squad when they evacuated from Sudean! They say these Sarkaz fight... well they're...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Inhuman.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The Vampire's men...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Notify all units. The operation has been cancelled. Prepare to pull out immediately.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no time. The Vampire fighters are moving way too fast... The Self-Salvation Corps has engaged them!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Change of plans. We're aiding the Self-Salvation Corps!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Where's the Cautus?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What Cautus?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Don't play dumb with me. She's been with you lot the last couple days.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I've no idea what you're talking about, and I'm not talking. Not even if you kill me.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Another stubborn bunch.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Urghhâ€”! What's this... Bugs?! Bloody...!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Hang in there, friend!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Back in formation. Don't let the bugs on the ground separate you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Defender operators, cover our allies' retreat!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps came here together, and so we will leave together!
attributes.name: Amiya
